mapper.select: SELECT YEAR, TERM, MANAGE_ST_DT, MANAGE_ED_DT, ENROLL_ST_DT, ENROLL_ED_DT, USE_YN, BIGO FROM TERM_CD WHERE 1=1 AND YEAR = #{year} AND term = #{term}
SELECT YEAR, TERM, MANAGE_ST_DT, MANAGE_ED_DT, ENROLL_ST_DT, ENROLL_ED_DT, USE_YN, BIGO FROM TERM_CD
mapper.insert:
insert into term_cd( year, term, manage_st_dt, manage_ed_dt, enroll_st_dt, enroll_ed_dt, use_yn, bigo, input_id, input_date, update_id, update_date
) values( #{year}, #{term}, #{manage_st_dt}, #{manage_ed_dt}, #{enroll_st_dt}, #{enroll_ed_dt}, #{use_yn}, #{bigo}, #{input_id}, #{input_date}, #{update_id}, #{update_date} )
mapper.delete: delete from term_cd where year=#{year} and term=#{term}
mapper.update: update term_cd set manage_st_dt = #{manage_st_dt}, manage_ed_dt = #{manage_ed_dt}, enroll_st_dt = #{enroll_st_dt}, enroll_ed_dt = #{enroll_ed_dt}, use_yn = #{use_yn}, bigo = #{bigo}, update_id = #{update_id}, update_date = NOW() where year=#{year} and term=#{term}
